title: Chapter 4473 - Chapter 4473: 4472 Strong Race, On The Other Side Of The Black Hole
body:
Chapter 4473 - Chapter 4473: 4472 Strong Race, On The Other Side Of The Black Hole

Chapter 4473: 4472 strong race, on the other side of the black hole

Wang Xian had explored about a third of the entire land of origin.

The deeper he went, the more he realized a problem.

The Stones of origin inside were all taken away by some chaos behemoths.

It seemed that there were chaos behemoths that could sense the location of the stones of origin.

Those who could divine that more than a dozen stones of origin were gathered together were mostly at the powerful chaos behemoths.

Or they were from the few existences at the chaos level.

Speaking of which, those few existences at the chaos level each had more than a dozen origin stones on them.

However, Wang Xian couldn’t snatch them away from them.

At the moment, he wasn’t able to kill those existences at the chaos level.

Even though he was already very powerful now.

He could suppress those existences at the chaos level, but he could still escape easily.

Therefore, Wang Xian was very straightforward and did not provoke such existences.

He flew quickly in the land of origin and used his divination ability to divine the location of the Stone of origin.

“I found one!”

After a few decades, Wang Xian’s eyes lit up when he saw the result of his divination. He quickly flew inside.

He shuttled through the caves. The entire land of origin was like a huge maze. If he did not know the exit, he could even get lost inside.

After all, the space inside was too big!

Wang Xian followed the divination information and searched bit by bit.

A year later, he came to the front of the land of divination!

“There is a gigantic beast of chaos ahead. This piece of the Stone of origin is inside the body of this gigantic beast of Chaos!”

Wang Xian sensed the presence of a gigantic beast of chaos ahead.

It was not a big problem for a gigantic beast of chaos at the control level.

Buzz

Wang Xian rushed over and immediately saw the gigantic beast of chaos inside.

Due to its powerful strength, the gigantic beast of chaos did not even notice Wang Xian’s appearance.

Wang Xian rushed over and killed it before it could react.

“Not bad.”

Wang Xian found the stone of origin and kept the corpse. He smiled.

The corpse of this chaotic behemoth was a huge resource.

In the Dragon Palace, some of the bones of the chaotic behemoth were even placed somewhere in the Dragon Palace by Prime Minister Gui.

This also represented the strength of the Dragon Palace.

“Continue.”

Wang Xian moved his body and continued to search.

“Eh?”

After a few hundred years, Wang Xian once again divined the location of a stone of origin.

This caused a smile to appear on his face.

Based on the information he divined, he quickly flew towards a certain direction.

“The location of this stone of origin is actually moving. It seems to be on the body of another giant beast of Chaos.”

Wang Xian was pleasantly surprised.

The Stone of origin was on the body of a giant beast of chaos. This was equivalent to not only harvesting the stone of origin, but also harvesting a space beast.

This was a huge harvest.

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian quickly locked onto his target and chased after it.

It took more than ten years for Wang Xian to come out of a cave. Only then did he see the space beast.

This was a giant beast of chaos that was emitting powerful spatial fluctuations. It had a pair of wings that were as thin as cicada wings.

It was flying forward.

Wang Xian looked over and his eyes were glowing.

The Great Dao level!

This was a gigantic beast of chaos that was on the Great Dao level.

Based on the energy fluctuations emitted from its body, it was comparable to two great dao level beasts. In addition, it had an additional control level beast.

This was an existence that was at the very top of the Great Dao.

Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz

Without any hesitation, Wang Xian instantly teleported towards the giant beast of chaos.

Bang Bang

Bang Bang

However, when Wang Xian rushed over, an invisible spatial barrier appeared around him.

These spatial barriers had been floating around the giant beast of chaos.

This was its natural barrier. Any creature that entered a certain range would definitely be discovered!

“Huh?”

Wang Xian had already sensed the existence of this natural barrier in advance. However, what surprised him was that when he broke through it with his body.

The body of the chaos behemoth instantly disappeared.

In just an instant, it disappeared from Wang Xian’s line of sight.

Even he couldn’t sense it.

This made him look surprised.

“This method is so strong.”

His face was full of surprise.

This barrier was connected to a certain escape skill of his main body.

When a creature broke through this barrier, the escape skill was instantly activated.

It left immediately.

Then, it could be confirmed that being able to break through the barrier also meant that it could threaten this space beast.

Therefore, this space behemoth immediately activated its escape ability and escaped.

Wang Xian was astonished.

This was the first space behemoth he had encountered that was so alert.

Such a space behemoth could escape from the pursuit of a primal chaos level!

Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz

However, just as Wang Xian was astonished, the surrounding space suddenly trembled.

A powerful spatial force enveloped the surrounding void.

The sudden spatial force caused him to reveal a stunned expression.

“What’s going on?”

Wang Xian actually didn’t sense it.

The sudden change caused his expression to change slightly.

Following that, he sensed waves of powerful auras appearing in front of him.

An aura at the chaos level.

Seven auras of the Great Dao level.

More than fifteen auras of the control level.

And no less than fifty auras of the beginner level.

The space was trembling.

One after another, illusory wings as thin as cicada wings enveloped the surrounding space!

This scene caused Wang Xian’s expression to change drastically.

“D * mn, a tribe of giant beasts of the chaos level. A tribe of the chaos level!”

His expression changed drastically.

This was the first tribe that Wang Xian had encountered that had a chaos level existence.

Most importantly, there were seven Great Dao levels.

This terrifying spatial power seemed to have sealed off the entire space!

Under such circumstances, even a chaos level powerhouse would die!

Buzz

Wang Xian did not hesitate at all. He instantly unleashed the mutated spatial power.

Flee!

This extremely powerful race was not something he could fight against Ade.

In fact, if he were to be trapped, there was a high chance that he would be killed by the other party.

The same race, the same attribute, the same innate skill.

When this race worked together, it was too terrifying!

Most importantly, they were the existences of the space attribute.

The top ten attributes, space was King!

Buzz! Buzz

When Wang Xian was teleporting away, a distorted force was applied to his body.

This caused Wang Xian’s expression to change again.

The mutated space force was actually disrupted!

“It’s because the space force of this race is too strong. They can even create an indestructible space domain to isolate everything in the world.”

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly.

Wang Xian’s escape was interrupted. However, even so, the powerful ability that belonged to an lie allowed him to teleport to a location.

However, this distance was a little shorter!
